mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment (user_id, board_id, comment_content, parent_id, uploaded_at) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{board_id}, #{comment_content}, #{parent_id}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.user_id, c.board_id, c.comment_content, c.parent_id, c.uploaded_at, u.username FROM board_comment c JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.board_id = #{board_id} AND c.parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY c.uploaded_at ASC

SELECT c.comment_id, c.user_id, c.board_id, c.comment_content, c.parent_id, c.uploaded_at, u.username FROM board_comment c JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.parent_id = #{parent_id} ORDER BY c.uploaded_at ASC
SELECT user_id FROM board_comment WHERE comment_id = #{comment_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_comment WHERE board_id = #{board_id}
